prompt: A serene indoor environment with a soothing color palette ranging from light teal to deep teal, viewed straight-on. The setting features calm natural lighting and soft shadows, with people relaxing or engaging in gentle conversation, their clothing subtly reflecting the gradient from light to deep teal. The background elements, such as furniture and decor, harmonize with the teal tones, creating a peaceful, cohesive atmosphere. No technology, screens, text, or abstract patterns presentâ€”only real objects and natural human interactions.

Professional, confident female life coach headshot, warm smile, photographed outdoors with soft natural light, lush greenery in the background, casual yet polished attire, natural makeup, relaxed and approachable demeanor

Professional male business consultant headshot, friendly and approachable expression, seated in a modern office with bookshelves and soft daylight, business casual clothing, neat hair, confident posture, subtle background details for depth

Professional female wellness expert headshot, genuine and authentic presence, standing in a bright, contemporary indoor space with plants, simple and elegant clothing, minimal makeup, soft and natural daylight, calm and inviting atmosphere

A professional portrait of a confident founder in a natural workspace, with soft, diffused daylight, casual yet polished attire, relaxed posture, surrounded by subtle, real-world office details such as plants, bookshelves, and wooden furniture. The environment feels inviting and authentic, with warm, earthy tones and a hint of personal items, capturing a genuine and approachable mood.

A confident professional coach sits comfortably in a relaxed, sunlit workspace. Soft natural light pours through large windows, illuminating warm wooden furniture and lush green plants. The coach appears approachable and at ease, dressed in smart casual attire. A few people are engaged in friendly conversation nearby, creating a welcoming, collaborative atmosphere. Variation in each image: change the time of day for different lighting (morning, afternoon, golden hour), alter the arrangement of furniture and plants, and feature different people with diverse appearances and clothing styles. Consistently maintain a professional, inviting vibe and never include any tech, screens, or text.
